dim.name: nCells
dim.description: The number of polygons in the primary grid.

dim.name: nEdges
dim.description: The number of edge midpoints in either the primary or dual grid.

dim.name: maxEdges
dim.description: The largest number of edges any polygon within the grid has.

dim.name: maxEdges2
dim.description: Two times the largest number of edges any polygon within the grid has.

dim.name: nAdvectionCells
dim.description: The largest number of advection cells for any edge.

dim.name: nVertices
dim.description: The total number of cells in the dual grid. Also the number of corners in the primary grid.

dim.name: TWO
dim.description: The number two as a dimension.

dim.name: R3
dim.description: The number three as a dimension.

dim.name: vertexDegree
dim.description: The number of cells or edges touching each vertex.

dim.name: nVertLevels
dim.description: The number of levels in the vertical direction. All vertical levels share the same horizontal locations.

dim.name: nVertLevelsP1
dim.description: The number of interfaces in the vertical direction.

nml_option.name: config_do_restart
nml_option.description: Determines if the initial conditions should be read from a restart file, or an input file.

nml_option.name: config_start_time
nml_option.description: Timestamp describing the initial time of the simulation. If it is set to 'file', the initial time is read from restart_timestamp.

nml_option.name: config_stop_time
nml_option.description: Timestamp descriping the final time of the simulation. If it is set to 'none' the final time is determined from config_start_time and config_run_duration.

nml_option.name: config_run_duration
nml_option.description: Timestamp describing the length of the simulation. If it is set to 'none' the duration is determined from config_start_time and config_stop_time. config_run_duration overrides inconsistent values of config_stop_time.

nml_option.name: config_calendar_type
nml_option.description: Selection of the type of calendar that should be used in the simulation.

nml_option.name: config_input_name
nml_option.description: The path to the input file for the simulation.

nml_option.name: config_output_name
nml_option.description: The template path and name to the output file from the simulation. A time stamp is prepended to the extension of the file (.nc).

nml_option.name: config_restart_name
nml_option.description: The template path and name to the restart file for the simulation. A time stamp is prepended to the extension of the file (.nc) both for input and output.

nml_option.name: config_restart_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often a restart file should be written.

nml_option.name: config_output_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often an output file should be written.

nml_option.name: config_stats_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often a global statistics files should be written.

nml_option.name: config_write_stats_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if statistics files should be written prior to the first time step.

nml_option.name: config_write_output_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an output file should be written prior to the first time step.

nml_option.name: config_frames_per_outfile
nml_option.description: Integer specifying how many time frames should be included in an output file. Once the maximum is reached, a new output file is created.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value greater than 0

nml_option.name: config_pio_num_iotasks
nml_option.description: Integer specifying how many IO tasks should be used within the PIO library. A value of 0 causes all MPI tasks to also be IO tasks. IO tasks are requried to write contiguous blocks of data to a file.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value greater than or equal to 0.

nml_option.name: config_pio_stride
nml_option.description: Integer specifying the stride of each IO task.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_dt
nml_option.description: Length of model time-step.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value, but limited by CFL condition.

nml_option.name: config_time_integrator
nml_option.description: Time integration method.

nml_option.name: config_vert_coord_movement
nml_option.description: Determines the vertical coordinate movement type. 'uniform_stretching' distributes SSH perturbations through all vertical levels (z-star vertical coordinate); 'fixed' places them all in the top level (z-level vertical coordinate); 'user_specified' allows the input file to determine the distribution using the variable vertCoordMovementWeights (weighted z-star vertical coordinate); and 'impermeable_interfaces' makes the vertical transport between layers zero, i.e. $w^t=0$ in (\ref{ocean:vert tranport}) (idealized isopycnal).

nml_option.name: config_use_min_max_thickness
nml_option.description: If true, a minimum and maximum thicknesses are enforced to prevent massless and very thick layers.

nml_option.name: config_min_thickness
nml_option.description: Minimum thickness allowed.
nml_option.possible_values: any positive real value, but typically 0.1 to 1 m.

nml_option.name: config_max_thickness_factor
nml_option.description: Maximum thickness allowed. This is a factor times the resting thickness, i.e., maximum thickness = config_max_thickness_factor*$h^{rest}$.
nml_option.possible_values: any positive real value, but typically 2-4.

nml_option.name: config_set_restingThickness_to_IC
nml_option.description: If true, set restingThickness to be the same as layerThickness upon start-up. This only occurs when config_do_restart is false, i.e. on an initial run.

nml_option.name: config_dzdk_positive
nml_option.description: Determines if the positive Z axis is aligned with the positive K index direction.

nml_option.name: config_use_freq_filtered_thickness
nml_option.description: If true, $h^{hf}$ is included in the desired ALE thickness in \ref{ocean:desired thickness}, and the prognostic equations \ref{ocean:Dlf} and \ref{ocean:hhf} are integrated in the code.

nml_option.name: config_thickness_filter_timescale
nml_option.description: Filter time scale for the low-frequency baroclinic divergence, $\tau_{Dlf}$.
nml_option.possible_values: any positive real value, but typically 5 days.

nml_option.name: config_use_highFreqThick_restore
nml_option.description: If true, the high frequency thickness equation (\ref{ocean:hhf}) includes term 2 on the RHS, the restoring term. The high frequency thickness is restored to zero with time scale $\tau_{hhf}$.

nml_option.name: config_highFreqThick_restore_time
nml_option.description: Restoring time scale for high-frequency thickness, $\tau_{hhf}$.
nml_option.possible_values: any positive real value, but typically 5-30 days.

nml_option.name: config_use_highFreqThick_del2
nml_option.description: If true, high frequency thickness equation (\ref{ocean:hhf}) includes term 3 on the RHS, the diffusion term.

nml_option.name: config_highFreqThick_del2
nml_option.description: Horizonal high frequency thickness diffusion, $\kappa_{hhf}$.

nml_option.name: config_alter_ICs_for_pbcs
nml_option.description: If true, initial conditions are altered according to the config_pbc_alteration_type flag. The alteration of layer thickness only occurs when config_do_restart is false, i.e. on an initial run.

nml_option.name: config_pbc_alteration_type
nml_option.description: Determines the method of initial condition alteration for partial bottom cells. 'partial_cell' alters layerThickness, interpolates all tracers in the bottom cell based on the bottomDepth variable, and alters bottomDepth to enforce the minimum pbc fraction. 'full_cell' alters bottomDepth to have full cells everywhere, based on the refBottomDepth variable.

nml_option.name: config_min_pbc_fraction
nml_option.description: Determines the minimum fraction of a cell altering the initial conditions can create. The alteration of layer thickness only occurs when config_do_restart is false, i.e. on an initial run.

nml_option.name: config_check_ssh_consistency
nml_option.description: Enables a check to determine if the SSH is within 2m of the surface, as specified in (\ref{ocean:pbc SSH}).

nml_option.name: config_num_halos
nml_option.description: Determines the number of halo cells extending from a blocks owned cells (Called the 0-Halo). The default of 3 is the minimum that can be used with monotonic advection.

nml_option.name: config_block_decomp_file_prefix
nml_option.description: Defines the prefix for the block decomposition file. Can include a path. The number of blocks is appended to the end of the prefix at run-time.
nml_option.possible_values: Any path/prefix to a block decomposition file.

nml_option.name: config_number_of_blocks
nml_option.description: Determines the number of blocks a simulation should be run with. If it is set to 0, the number of blocks is the same as the number of MPI tasks at run-time.

nml_option.name: config_explicit_proc_decomp
nml_option.description: Determines if an explicit processor decomposition should be used. This is only useful if multiple blocks per processor are used.

nml_option.name: config_proc_decomp_file_prefix
nml_option.description: Defines the prefix for the processor decomposition file. This file is only read if config_explicit_proc_decomp is .true. The number of processors is appended to the end of the prefix at run-time.
nml_option.possible_values: Any path/prefix to a processor decomposition file.

nml_option.name: config_hmix_ScaleWithMesh
nml_option.description: If false, del2 and del4 coefficients are constant throughout the mesh (equivalent to setting $\rho_m=1$ throughout the mesh). If true, these coefficients scale as mesh density to the -3/4 power.

nml_option.name: config_maxMeshDensity
nml_option.description: Global maximum of the mesh density
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number. If set any negative real number, config_maxMeshDensity is computed during the initialization of each simulation.

nml_option.name: config_apvm_scale_factor
nml_option.description: Anticipated potential vorticity (APV) method scale factor, $c_{apv}$. When zero, APV is off.
nml_option.possible_values: Any non-negative number, typically between zero and one.

nml_option.name: config_use_mom_del2
nml_option.description: If true, Laplacian horizontal mixing is used on the momentum equation.

nml_option.name: config_use_tracer_del2
nml_option.description: If true, Laplacian horizontal mixing is used on the tracer equation.

nml_option.name: config_mom_del2
nml_option.description: Horizonal viscosity, $\nu_h$.

nml_option.name: config_tracer_del2
nml_option.description: Horizonal diffusion, $\kappa_h$.

nml_option.name: config_use_mom_del4
nml_option.description: If true, biharmonic horizontal mixing is used on the momentum equation.

nml_option.name: config_use_tracer_del4
nml_option.description: If true, biharmonic horizontal mixing is used on the tracer equation.

nml_option.name: config_mom_del4
nml_option.description: Coefficient for horizontal biharmonic operator on momentum.

nml_option.name: config_tracer_del4
nml_option.description: Coefficient for horizontal biharmonic operator on tracers.

nml_option.name: config_use_Leith_del2
nml_option.description: If true, the Leith enstrophy-cascade closure is turned on

nml_option.name: config_Leith_parameter
nml_option.description: Non-dimensional Leith closure parameter

nml_option.name: config_Leith_dx
nml_option.description: Characteristic length scale, usually the smallest dx in the mesh

nml_option.name: config_Leith_visc2_max
nml_option.description: Upper bound on the allowable value of Leith-computed viscosity

nml_option.name: config_h_kappa
nml_option.description: kappa parameter for Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization

nml_option.name: config_h_kappa_q
nml_option.description: kappa-q parameter for Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization

nml_option.name: config_Rayleigh_friction
nml_option.description: If true, Rayleigh friction is included in the momentum equation.

nml_option.name: config_Rayleigh_damping_coeff
nml_option.description: Inverse-time coefficient for the Rayleigh damping term, $c_R$.

nml_option.name: config_convective_visc
nml_option.description: Value of vertical viscosity to be used in unstable conditions (i.e. Richardson number less than zero)

nml_option.name: config_convective_diff
nml_option.description: Value of vertical diffusion to be used in unstable conditions (i.e. Richardson number less than zero)

nml_option.name: config_use_const_visc
nml_option.description: If true, constant vertical viscosity is included in the momentum equation

nml_option.name: config_use_const_diff
nml_option.description: If true, constant vertical diffusion is included in the tracer equation

nml_option.name: config_vert_visc
nml_option.description: Vertical viscosity, applied uniformly throughout domain

nml_option.name: config_vert_diff
nml_option.description: Vertical diffusion, applied uniformly throughout domain

nml_option.name: config_use_rich_visc
nml_option.description: If true, Richardson-number based vertical viscosity is included in the momentum equation

nml_option.name: config_use_rich_diff
nml_option.description: If true, Richardson-number based vertical diffusion is included in the tracer equation

nml_option.name: config_bkrd_vert_visc
nml_option.description: Background vertical viscosity for Richardson-number based vertical mixing, $\nu_{bkrd}$

nml_option.name: config_bkrd_vert_diff
nml_option.description: Background vertical diffusion for Richardson-number based vertical mixing, $\kappa_{bkrd}$

nml_option.name: config_rich_mix
nml_option.description: Coefficient for Richardon-number vertical mixing function, $c_{Ri}$

nml_option.name: config_use_tanh_visc
nml_option.description: If true, tanh-based vertical viscosity is included in the momentum equation

nml_option.name: config_use_tanh_diff
nml_option.description: If true, tanh-based vertical diffusion is included in the tracer equation

nml_option.name: config_max_visc_tanh
nml_option.description: maximum viscosity value for tanh-fit function

nml_option.name: config_min_visc_tanh
nml_option.description: minimum viscosity value for tanh-fit function

nml_option.name: config_max_diff_tanh
nml_option.description: maximum diffusion value for tanh-fit function

nml_option.name: config_min_diff_tanh
nml_option.description: minimum diffusion value for tanh-fit function

nml_option.name: config_zMid_tanh
nml_option.description: z-coodinate location of center of tanh function

nml_option.name: config_zWidth_tanh
nml_option.description: vertical width parameter for tanh function

registry.nml_record: <nml_option name="config_flux_attenuation_coefficient" type="real" default_value="0.001" units="m" description="Coefficient used to determine transmission of surface fluxes. Fluxes are defined with $e^{z/\gamma}$ where this coefficient is $\gamma$." possible_values="Any real number $0.0 < \gamma <= 1.0$" />

nml_option.name: config_vert_tracer_adv
nml_option.description: Method for interpolating tracer values from layer centers to layer edges

nml_option.name: config_vert_tracer_adv_order
nml_option.description: Order of polynomial used for tracer reconstruction at layer edges

nml_option.name: config_horiz_tracer_adv_order
nml_option.description: Order of polynomial used for tracer reconstruction at cell edges

nml_option.name: config_coef_3rd_order
nml_option.description: Reconstruction of 3rd-order reconstruction to blend with 4th-order reconstuction

nml_option.name: config_monotonic
nml_option.description: If .true. then fluxes are limited to produce a monotonic advection scheme

nml_option.name: config_bottom_drag_coeff
nml_option.description: Dimensionless bottom drag coefficient, $c_{drag}$.

nml_option.name: config_pressure_gradient_type
nml_option.description: Form of pressure gradient terms in momentum equation. For most applications, the gradient of pressure and layer mid-depth are appropriate. For isopycnal coordinates, one may use the gradient of the Montgomery potential.

nml_option.name: config_density0
nml_option.description: Density used as a coefficient of the pressure gradient terms, $\rho_0$. This is a constant due to the Boussinesq approximation.

nml_option.name: config_eos_type
nml_option.description: Character string to choose EOS formulation
nml_option.possible_values: Jackett McDougall EOS = 'jm' and Linear EOS = 'linear'

nml_option.name: config_eos_linear_alpha
nml_option.description: Linear thermal expansion coefficient

nml_option.name: config_eos_linear_beta
nml_option.description: Linear haline contraction coefficient

nml_option.name: config_eos_linear_Tref
nml_option.description: Reference temperature

nml_option.name: config_eos_linear_Sref
nml_option.description: Reference salinity

nml_option.name: config_eos_linear_densityref
nml_option.description: Reference density, i.e. density when T=Tref and S=Sref

nml_option.name: config_n_ts_iter
nml_option.description: number of large iterations over stages 1-3
nml_option.possible_values: any positive integer, but typically 1, 2, or 3

nml_option.name: config_n_bcl_iter_beg
nml_option.description: number of iterations of stage 1 (baroclinic solve) on the first split-explicit iteration
nml_option.possible_values: any positive integer, but typically 1, 2, or 3

nml_option.name: config_n_bcl_iter_mid
nml_option.description: number of iterations of stage 1 (baroclinic solve) on any split-explicit iterations between first and last
nml_option.possible_values: any positive integer, but typically 1, 2, or 3

nml_option.name: config_n_bcl_iter_end
nml_option.description: number of iterations of stage 1 (baroclinic solve) on the last split-explicit iteration
nml_option.possible_values: any positive integer, but typically 1, 2, or 3

nml_option.name: config_n_btr_subcycles
nml_option.description: number of barotropic subcycles in stage 2
nml_option.possible_values: any positive integer, typically between 10 and 100

nml_option.name: config_n_btr_cor_iter
nml_option.description: number of iterations of the velocity corrector step in stage 2
nml_option.possible_values: any positive integer, but typically 1, 2, or 3

nml_option.name: config_vel_correction
nml_option.description: If true, the velocity correction term is included in the horizontal advection of thickness and tracers

nml_option.name: config_btr_subcycle_loop_factor
nml_option.description: Barotropic subcycles proceed from $t$ to $t+n\Delta t$, where $n$ is this configuration option.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer, but typically 1 or 2

nml_option.name: config_btr_gam1_velWt1
nml_option.description: Weighting of velocity in the SSH predictor step in stage 2. When zero, previous subcycle time is used; when one, new subcycle time is used.

nml_option.name: config_btr_gam2_SSHWt1
nml_option.description: Weighting of SSH in the velocity corrector step in stage 2. When zero, previous subcycle time is used; when one, new subcycle time is used.

nml_option.name: config_btr_gam3_velWt2
nml_option.description: Weighting of velocity in the SSH corrector step in stage 2. When zero, previous subcycle time is used; when one, new subcycle time is used.

nml_option.name: config_btr_solve_SSH2
nml_option.description: If true, execute the SSH corrector step in stage 2

nml_option.name: config_check_zlevel_consistency
nml_option.description: Enables a run-time check for consistency for a zlevel grid. Ensures relevant variables correctly define the bottom of the ocean.

nml_option.name: config_filter_btr_mode
nml_option.description: Enables filtering of the barotropic mode.

nml_option.name: config_prescribe_velocity
nml_option.description: Enables a prescribed velocity field. This velocity field is read on input, and remains constant through a simulation.

nml_option.name: config_prescribe_thickness
nml_option.description: Enables a prescribed thickness field. This thickness field is read on input, and remains constant through a simulation.

nml_option.name: config_include_KE_vertex
nml_option.description: If true, the kinetic energy in each cell is computed by blending cell-based and vertex-based values of kinetic energy.

nml_option.name: config_check_tracer_monotonicity
nml_option.description: Enables a change on tracer monotonicity at the end of the monotonic advection routine. Only used if config_monotonic is set to .true.

nml_option.name: config_disable_thick_all_tend
nml_option.description: Disables all tendencies on the thickness field.

nml_option.name: config_disable_thick_hadv
nml_option.description: Disable tendencies on the thickness field from horizontal advection.

nml_option.name: config_disable_thick_vadv
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on the thickness field from vertical advection.

nml_option.name: config_disable_vel_all_tend
nml_option.description: Disables all tendencies on the velocity field.

nml_option.name: config_disable_vel_coriolis
nml_option.description: Diables tendencies on the velocity field from the Coriolis force.

nml_option.name: config_disable_vel_pgrad
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on the velocity field from the horizontal pressure gradient.

nml_option.name: config_disable_vel_hmix
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on the velocity field from horizontal mixing.

nml_option.name: config_disable_vel_windstress
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on the velocity field from horizontal wind stress.

nml_option.name: config_disable_vel_vmix
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on the velocity field from vertical mixing.

nml_option.name: config_disable_vel_vadv
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on the velocity field from vertical advection.

nml_option.name: config_disable_tr_all_tend
nml_option.description: Disables all tendencies on tracer fields.

nml_option.name: config_disable_tr_adv
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on tracer fields from advection, both horizontal and vertical.

nml_option.name: config_disable_tr_hmix
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on tracer fields from horizontal mixing.

nml_option.name: config_disable_tr_vmix
nml_option.description: Disables tendencies on tracer fields from vertical mixing.

var.name: temperature
var.description: potential temperature

var.name: normalVelocity
var.description: horizonal velocity, normal component to an edge

var.name: layerThickness
var.description: layer thickness

var.name: ssh
var.description: sea surface height

var.name: highFreqThickness
var.description: high frequency-filtered layer thickness

var.name: lowFreqDivergence
var.description: low frequency-filtered divergence

var.name: normalBarotropicVelocity
var.description: barotropic velocity, used in split-explicit time-stepping

var.name: normalBarotropicVelocitySubcycle
var.description: barotropic velocity, used in subcycling in stage 2 of split-explicit time-stepping

var.name: sshSubcycle
var.description: sea surface height, used in subcycling in stage 2 of split-explicit time-stepping

var.name: normalBaroclinicVelocity
var.description: baroclinic velocity, used in split-explicit time-stepping

var.name: latCell
var.description: Latitude location of cell centers in radians.

var.name: lonCell
var.description: Longitude location of cell centers in radians.

var.name: xCell
var.description: X Coordinate in cartesian space of cell centers.

var.name: yCell
var.description: Y Coordinate in cartesian space of cell centers.

var.name: zCell
var.description: Z Coordinate in cartesian space of cell centers.

var.name: indexToCellID
var.description: List of global cell IDs.

var.name: latEdge
var.description: Latitude location of edge midpoints in radians.

var.name: lonEdge
var.description: Longitude location of edge midpoints in radians.

var.name: xEdge
var.description: X Coordinate in cartesian space of edge midpoints.

var.name: yEdge
var.description: Y Coordinate in cartesian space of edge midpoints.

var.name: zEdge
var.description: Z Coordinate in cartesian space of edge midpoints.

var.name: indexToEdgeID
var.description: List of global edge IDs.

var.name: latVertex
var.description: Latitude location of vertices in radians.

var.name: lonVertex
var.description: Longitude location of vertices in radians.

var.name: xVertex
var.description: X Coordinate in cartesian space of vertices.

var.name: yVertex
var.description: Y Coordinate in cartesian space of vertices.

var.name: zVertex
var.description: Z Coordinate in cartesian space of vertices.

var.name: indexToVertexID
var.description: List of global vertex IDs.

var.name: meshDensity
var.description: Value of density function used to generate a particular mesh at cell centers.

var.name: meshScalingDel2
var.description: Coefficient to Laplacian mixing terms in momentum and tracer equations, so that viscosity and diffusion scale with mesh.

var.name: meshScalingDel4
var.description: Coefficient to biharmonic mixing terms in momentum and tracer equations, so that biharmonic viscosity and diffusion coefficients scale with mesh.

var.name: meshScaling
var.description: Coefficient used for mesh scaling, such as the Leith parameter.

var.name: cellsOnEdge
var.description: List of cells that straddle each edge.

var.name: nEdgesOnCell
var.description: Number of edges that border each cell.

var.name: nEdgesOnEdge
var.description: Number of edges that surround each of the cells that straddle each edge. These edges are used to reconstruct the tangential velocities.

var.name: edgesOnCell
var.description: List of edges that border each cell.

var.name: edgesOnEdge
var.description: List of edges that border each of the cells that straddle each edge.

var.name: weightsOnEdge
var.description: Reconstruction weights associated with each of the edgesOnEdge.

var.name: dvEdge
var.description: Length of each edge, computed as the distance between verticesOnEdge.

var.name: dcEdge
var.description: Length of each edge, computed as the distance between cellsOnEdge.

var.name: angleEdge
var.description: Angle the edge normal makes with local eastward direction.

var.name: areaCell
var.description: Area of each cell in the primary grid.

var.name: areaTriangle
var.description: Area of each cell (triangle) in the dual grid.

var.name: edgeNormalVectors
var.description: Normal vector defined at an edge.

var.name: localVerticalUnitVectors
var.description: Unit surface normal vectors defined at cell centers.

var.name: cellTangentPlane
var.description: The two vectors that define a tangent plane at a cell center.

var.name: cellsOnCell
var.description: List of cells that neighbor each cell.

var.name: verticesOnCell
var.description: List of vertices that border each cell.

var.name: verticesOnEdge
var.description: List of vertices that straddle each edge.

var.name: edgesOnVertex
var.description: List of edges that share a vertex as an endpoint.

var.name: cellsOnVertex
var.description: List of cells that share a vertex.

var.name: kiteAreasOnVertex
var.description: Area of the portions of each dual cell that are part of each cellsOnVertex.

var.name: fEdge
var.description: Coriolis parameter at edges.

var.name: fVertex
var.description: Coriolis parameter at vertices.

var.name: bottomDepth
var.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean. Given as a positive distance from sea level.

var.name: deriv_two
var.description: Value of the second derivative of the polynomial used for reconstruction of cell center quantities at edges.

var.name: adv_coefs
var.description: Weighting coefficients used for reconstruction of cell center quantities at edges. Used in advection routines.

var.name: adv_coefs_3rd
var.description: Wegihting coefficients used for reconstruction of cell center quantities at edges. Used in advection routines.

var.name: advCellsForEdge
var.description: List of cells used to reconstruct a cell quantity at an edge. Used in advection routines.

var.name: nAdvCellsForEdge
var.description: Number of cells used in reconstruction of cell center quantities at an edge. Used in advection routines.

var.name: highOrderAdvectionMask
var.description: Mask for high order advection. Values are 1 if high order is used, and 0 if not.

var.name: defc_a
var.description: Variable used with advection setup to compute advection coefficients. Deformation weight coefficients.

var.name: defc_b
var.description: Variable used with advection setup to compute advection coefficients. Deformation weight coefficients.

var.name: coeffs_reconstruct
var.description: Coefficients to reconstruct velocity vectors at cells centers.

var.name: maxLevelCell
var.description: Index to the last active ocean cell in each column.

var.name: maxLevelEdgeTop
var.description: Index to the last edge in a column with active ocean cells on both sides of it.

var.name: maxLevelEdgeBot
var.description: Index to the last edge in a column with at least one active ocean cell on either side of it.

var.name: maxLevelVertexTop
var.description: Index to the last vertex in a column with all active cells around it.

var.name: maxLevelVertexBot
var.description: Index to the last vertex in a column with at least one active ocean cell around it.

var.name: refBottomDepth
var.description: Reference depth of ocean for each vertical level. Used in 'z-level' type runs.

var.name: refBottomDepthTopOfCell
var.description: Reference depth of ocean for each vertical interface. Used in 'z-level' type runs.

var.name: vertCoordMovementWeights
var.description: Weights used for distribution of sea surface heigh purturbations through multiple vertical levels.

var.name: boundaryEdge
var.description: Mask for determining boundary edges. A boundary edge has only one active ocean cell neighboring it.

var.name: boundaryVertex
var.description: Mask for determining boundary vertices. A boundary vertex has at least one inactive cell neighboring it.

var.name: boundaryCell
var.description: Mask for determining boundary cells. A boundary cell has at least one inactive cell neighboring it.

var.name: edgeMask
var.description: Mask on edges that determines if computations should be done on edge.

var.name: vertexMask
var.description: Mask on vertices that determines if computations should be done on vertice.

var.name: cellMask
var.description: Mask on cells that determines if computations should be done on cell.

var.name: normalVelocityForcing
var.description: Velocity forcing field. Defines a forcing at an edge.

var.name: temperatureRestore
var.description: Temperature restoring field, for restoring temperature at the surface.

var.name: salinityRestore
var.description: Salinity restoring field, for restoring salinity at the surface.

var.name: edgeSignOnCell
var.description: Sign of edge contributions to a cell for each edge on cell. Used for bit-reproducible loops. Represents directionality of vector connecting cells.

var.name: edgeSignOnVertex
var.description: Sign of edge contributions to a vertex for each edge on vertex. Used for bit-reproducible loops. Represents directionality of vector connecting vertices.

var.name: kiteIndexOnCell
var.description: Index of kite in dual grid, based on verticesOnCell.

var.name: restingThickness
var.description: Layer thickness when the ocean is at rest, i.e. without SSH or internal perturbations.

var.name: refZMid
var.description: Reference mid z-coordinate of ocean for each vertical level. This has a negative value.

var.name: refLayerThickness
var.description: Reference layerThickness of ocean for each vertical level.

var.name: tend_temperature
var.description: time tendency of potential temperature

var.name: tend_salinity
var.description: time tendency of salinity measured as change in practical salinity units per second

var.name: tend_tracer1
var.description: test tracer

var.name: tend_normalVelocity
var.description: time tendency of normal component of velocity

var.name: tend_layerThickness
var.description: time tendency of layer thickness

var.name: tend_ssh
var.description: time tendency of sea-surface height

var.name: tend_highFreqThickness
var.description: time tendency of high frequency-filtered layer thickness

var.name: tend_lowFreqDivergence
var.description: time tendency of low frequency-filtered divergence

var.name: xtime
var.description: model time, with format 'YYYY-MM-DD_HH:MM:SS'

var.name: temperatureSurfaceValue
var.description: potential temperature extrapolated to ocean surface

var.name: salinitySurfaceValue
var.description: salinity extrapolated to ocean surface

var.name: tracer1SurfaceValue
var.description: Tracer of 1 extrapolated to ocean surface

var.name: zonalSurfaceVelocity
var.description: Zonal surface velocity reconstructed at cell centers

var.name: meridionalSurfaceVelocity
var.description: Meridional surface velocity reconstructed at cell centers

var.name: zonalSSHGradient
var.description: Zonal gradient of SSH reconstructed at cell centers

var.name: meridionalSSHGradient
var.description: Meridional gradient of SSH reconstructed at cell centers

var.name: zMid
var.description: z-coordinate of the mid-depth of the layer

var.name: zTop
var.description: z-coordinate of the top of the layer

var.name: displacedDensity
var.description: Density displaced adiabatically to the mid-depth one layer deeper. That is, layer k has been displaced to the depth of layer k+1.

var.name: potentialDensity
var.description: potential density: density displaced adiabatically to the mid-depth of top layer

var.name: BruntVaisalaFreqTop
var.description: Brunt Vaisala frequency defined at the center (horizontally) and top (vertically) of cell

var.name: montgomeryPotential
var.description: Montgomery potential, may be used as the pressure for isopycnal coordinates.

var.name: pressure
var.description: pressure used in the momentum equation

var.name: uTransport
var.description: horizontal velocity used to transport mass and tracers

var.name: vertTransportVelocityTop
var.description: vertical transport through the layer interface at the top of the cell

var.name: vertVelocityTop
var.description: vertical velocity defined at center (horizonally) and top (vertically) of cell

var.name: tangentialVelocity
var.description: horizontal velocity, tangential to an edge

var.name: layerThicknessEdge
var.description: layer thickness averaged from cell center to edges

var.name: layerThicknessVertex
var.description: layer thickness averaged from cell center to vertices

var.name: kineticEnergyCell
var.description: kinetic energy of horizonal velocity on cells

var.name: hEddyFlux
var.description: Eddy flux in Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization

var.name: hKappa
var.description: kappa parameter for Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization

var.name: hKappaQ
var.description: kappaQ parameter for Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization

var.name: viscosity
var.description: horizontal viscosity

var.name: divergence
var.description: divergence of horizonal velocity

var.name: circulation
var.description: area-integrated vorticity

var.name: relativeVorticity
var.description: curl of horizontal velocity, defined at vertices

var.name: relativeVorticityCell
var.description: curl of horizontal velocity, averaged from vertices to cell centers

var.name: normalizedRelativeVorticityEdge
var.description: curl of horizontal velocity divided by layer thickness, averaged from vertices to edges

var.name: normalizedPlanetaryVorticityEdge
var.description: earth's rotational rate (Coriolis parameter, f) divided by layer thickness, averaged from vertices to edges

var.name: normalizedRelativeVorticityCell
var.description: curl of horizontal velocity divided by layer thickness, averaged from vertices to cell centers

var.name: barotropicForcing
var.description: Barotropic tendency computed from the baroclinic equations in stage 1 of the split-explicit algorithm.

var.name: barotropicThicknessFlux
var.description: Barotropic thickness flux at each edge, used to advance sea surface height in each subcycle of stage 2 of the split-explicit algorithm.

var.name: normalVelocityX
var.description: component of horizontal velocity in the x-direction (cartesian)

var.name: normalVelocityY
var.description: component of horizontal velocity in the y-direction (cartesian)

var.name: normalVelocityZ
var.description: component of horizontal velocity in the z-direction (cartesian)

var.name: normalVelocityZonal
var.description: component of horizontal velocity in the eastward direction

var.name: normalVelocityMeridional
var.description: component of horizontal velocity in the northward

var.name: gradSSH
var.description: Gradient of sea surface height at edges.

var.name: gradSSHX
var.description: X Component of the gradient of sea surface height at cell centers.

var.name: gradSSHY
var.description: Y Component of the gradient of sea surface height at cell centers.

var.name: gradSSHZ
var.description: Z Component of the gradient of sea surface height at cell centers.

var.name: gradSSHZonal
var.description: Zonal Component of the gradient of sea surface height at cell centers.

var.name: gradSSHMeridional
var.description: Meridional Component of the gradient of sea surface height at cell centers.

var.name: uBolusGM
var.description: Bolus velocity in Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization

var.name: uBolusGMX
var.description: Bolus velocity in Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization, x-direction

var.name: uBolusGMY
var.description: Bolus velocity in Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization, y-direction

var.name: uBolusGMZ
var.description: Bolus velocity in Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization, z-direction

var.name: uBolusGMZonal
var.description: Bolus velocity in Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization, zonal-direction

var.name: uBolusGMMeridional
var.description: Bolus velocity in Gent-McWilliams eddy parameterization, meridional-direction

var.name: RiTopOfCell
var.description: gradient Richardson number defined at the center (horizontally) and top (vertically)

var.name: RiTopOfEdge
var.description: gradient Richardson number defined at the edge (horizontally) and top (vertically)

var.name: vertViscTopOfEdge
var.description: vertical viscosity defined at the edge (horizontally) and top (vertically)

var.name: vertDiffTopOfCell
var.description: vertical diffusion defined at the cell center (horizontally) and top (vertically)

var.name: bulkRichardsonNumber
var.description: bulk Richardson number

var.name: boundaryLayerDepth
var.description: diagnosed depth of the ocean surface boundary layer

var.name: indexBoundaryLayerDepth
var.description: int(indexBoundaryLayerDepth) is vertical layer within which boundaryLayerDepth resides. mod(indexBoundaryLayerDepth) is fractional position within that layer.

var.name: surfaceFrictionVelocity
var.description: diagnosed surface friction velocity defined as square root of (mag(wind stress) / reference density)

var.name: surfaceBuoyancyForcing
var.description: diagnosed surface buoyancy forcing due to heat, salt and freshwater fluxes at ocean surface

var.name: windStressZonalDiag
var.description: reconstructed surface wind stress in the eastward direction. Used for diagnostics.

var.name: windStressMeridionalDiag
var.description: reconstructed surface wind stress in the northward direction. User for diagnostics.

var.name: areaCellGlobal
var.description: sum of the areaCell variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: areaEdgeGlobal
var.description: sum of the areaEdge variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: areaTriangleGlobal
var.description: sum of the areaTriangle variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: volumeCellGlobal
var.description: sum of the volumeCell variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: volumeEdgeGlobal
var.description: sum of the volumeEdge variable over the full domain, used to normalize global statistics

var.name: CFLNumberGlobal
var.description: maximum CFL number over the full domain

var.name: nAverage
var.description: number of timesteps in time-averaged variables

var.name: avgSsh
var.description: time-averaged sea surface height

var.name: varSsh
var.description: variance of sea surface height

var.name: avgVelocityZonal
var.description: time-averaged velocity in the eastward direction

var.name: avgVelocityMeridional
var.description: time-averaged velocity in the northward direction

var.name: varVelocityZonal
var.description: variance of velocity in the eastward direction

var.name: varVelocityMeridional
var.description: variance of velocity in the northward direction

var.name: avgNormalVelocity
var.description: time-averaged velocity, normal to cell edge

var.name: varNormalVelocity
var.description: variance of velocity, normal to cell edge

var.name: avgVertVelocityTop
var.description: time-averaged vertical velocity at top of cell

var.name: surfaceWindStress
var.description: Wind stress at the surface of the ocean defined at edge midpoints.

var.name: surfaceWindStressMagnitude
var.description: Magnitude of wind stress at the surface of the ocean, at cell centers.

var.name: surfaceMassFlux
var.description: Flux of mass through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: surfaceTemperatureFlux
var.description: Flux of temperature through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: surfaceSalinityFlux
var.description: Flux of salinity through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: seaSurfacePressure
var.description: Pressure defined at the sea surface.

var.name: seaIceEnergy
var.description: Energy per unit area trapped in frazil ice formation. Always >= 0.0.

var.name: penetrativeTemperatureFlux
var.description: Penetrative temperature flux at the surface due to solar radiation. Positive is into the ocean.

var.name: windStressZonal
var.description: Zonal (eastward) component of wind stress at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: windStressMeridional
var.description: Meridional (northward) component of wind stress at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: latentHeatFlux
var.description: Latent heat flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: sensibleHeatFlux
var.description: Sensible heat flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: longWaveHeatFluxUp
var.description: Upward long wave heat flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: longWaveHeatFluxDown
var.description: Downward long wave heat flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: seaIceHeatFlux
var.description: Sea ice heat flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: shortWaveHeatFlux
var.description: Short wave flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: evaporationFlux
var.description: Evaporation flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: seaIceSalinityFlux
var.description: Sea ice salinity flux at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: seaIceFreshWaterFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from sea ice at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: riverRunoffFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from river runoff at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: iceRunoffFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from ice runoff at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: rainFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from rain at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: snowFlux
var.description: Fresh water flux from snow at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: iceFraction
var.description: Fraction of sea ice coverage at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: prognosticCO2
var.description: Prognostic CO2 at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: diagnosticCO2
var.description: Diagnostic CO2 at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: squaredWindSpeed10Meter
var.description: Squared wind speed at 10 meters at cell centers from coupler.

var.name: nAccumulatedCoupled
var.description: Number of accumulations in time averaging of coupler fields

var.name: avgTemperatureSurfaceValue
var.description: Time averaged potential temperature extrapolated to ocean surface

var.name: avgSalinitySurfaceValue
var.description: Time averaged salinity extrapolated to ocean surface

var.name: avgZonalSurfaceVelocity
var.description: Time averaged zonal surface velocity

var.name: avgMeridionalSurfaceVelocity
var.description: Time averaged meridional surface velocity

var.name: avgZonalSSHGradient
var.description: Time averaged zonal gradient of SSH

var.name: avgMeridionalSSHGradient
var.description: Time averaged meridional gradient of SSH

var.name: CO2Flux
var.description: CO2 Flux.

var.name: DMSFlux
var.description: DMS Flux.

var.name: normalVelocityForcingX
var.description: reconstructed wind stress in the x-direction (cartesian)

var.name: normalVelocityForcingY
var.description: reconstructed wind stress in the y-direction (cartesian)

var.name: normalVelocityForcingZ
var.description: reconstructed wind stress in the z-direction (cartesian)

var.name: normalVelocityForcingZonal
var.description: reconstructed wind stress in the eastward direction

var.name: normalVelocityForcingMeridional
var.description: reconstructed wind stress in the northward direction

var.name: vorticityGradientTangentialComponent
var.description: gradient of vorticity in the tangent direction (positive points from vertex1 to vertex2)

var.name: vorticityGradientNormalComponent
var.description: gradient of vorticity in the normal direction (positive points from cell1 to cell2)

var.name: normalizedRelativeVorticityVertex
var.description: curl of horizontal velocity divided by layer thickness, defined at vertices

var.name: normalizedPlanetaryVorticityVertex
var.description: earth's rotational rate (Coriolis parameter, f) divided by layer thickness, defined at vertices

var.name: kineticEnergyVertex
var.description: kinetic energy of horizonal velocity defined at vertices

var.name: kineticEnergyVertexOnCells
var.description: kinetic energy of horizonal velocity defined at vertices

var.name: densitySurfaceDisplaced
var.description: Density computed by displacing SST and SSS to every vertical layer within the column

var.name: thermalExpansionCoeff
var.description: Thermal expansion coefficient (alpha), defined as $-1/\rho d\rho/dT$ (note negative sign).

var.name: salineContractionCoeff
var.description: Saline contraction coefficient (beta), defined as $1/\rho d\rho/dS$. This is also called the haline contraction coefficient.
